pathAssistantSteps.info: We'll get a date/time for the mission. During this time, you should also select the mission team and decide what equipment is needed.
Everything is done, right? We're just waiting until it's time. If the mission changes because of new intel, send it back to Planning.
We may not get to all the missions that we're asked to do. But this is a good way to manage the process by capturing the important details so we can prioritize and assign.
